architecture.characters

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.TimerTask
      • architecture.characters.Combatant
        • architecture.characters.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Renderable, Updateable, java.lang.Runnable

    public class Player
extends Combatant
implements Updateable
    The class of the main character, the protagonist, of the game. Player handles inventory management, growth (leveling up), etc.

        public boolean gainExp(int exp)
        Adds exp to the Player and calls levelUp() if exp exceeds limit.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true if levelUp() is called

      • levelUp

        public void levelUp()
        Called when player levels up; level is incremented, SPD is increased, and 1/2 of HP and mana is restored. Exp must exceed expLimit.

      • updateAttributes

        public void updateAttributes()
        Description copied from class: Combatant
        Updates the attributes of the Combatant, which in turn updates the stats. Method is called whenever equipment or volatile effects change.

      • acquireAll

        public void acquireAll(java.util.List<Item> contents)
        Adds a List of boosts to player equipment OR heals the player. This method is called when the Player opens a Chest.
        Parameters:
        contents - boosts or health recovery
